description.ko: 빛이 수정을 통과하며 본연의 색으로 분산되는 과정을 시각적으로 탐구합니다. 이는 PRISM-2 프로젝트가 지닌 다각적인 면모와 변화의 가치를 상징합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of light's transformation as it passes through a crystalline medium, breaking into its fundamental colors to represent the multi-faceted nature of the PRISM-2 project.

prompt: Hyper-realistic 3D rendering of a glass prism positioned on a dark reflective surface, a single beam of pure white light hitting the edge and dispersing into a brilliant, wide-angle rainbow spectrum. Ethereal light refraction, soft caustics, cinematic bokeh background, sharp geometric lines, 8k resolution, minimalist aesthetic.
